subtitle: Use AI to generate a quiz based on the files you upload.
subjectTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of the subject (EG: Math)
quizTitlePlaceholder: Enter an identifying title for the quiz
quizDurationPlaceholder: Enter the duration of the quiz in minutes
quizNumberOfQuestionsPlaceholder: The number of questions you want to have the AI generate
quizDescriptionPlaceholder: Enter whatever you want to describe the quiz
quizPercentagePlaceholder: Minimum percentage to pass the quiz
cannotSubmitPleaseAnswerAllQuestionsBefo: Cannot submit. Please answer all questions before submitting.
subject: Subject
couldNotGenerateXQuestions_one: Please keep in mind that we could not generate {{count}} question, but we have generated the rest.
couldNotGenerateXQuestions_other: Please keep in mind that we could not generate {{count}} questions, but we have generated the rest.
materialTooShortSubtitle: Uploaded material too short for requested number of questions. Please upload more files and/or longer material or reduce number of questions
areYouSureYouWantToDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
missingFieldsSubtitle: Please fill in all fields before submitting
invalidFields: Please fill in all fields correctly
invalidFieldsSubtitle: Please fill in all fields correctly before submitting
welcomeToQuizBuddySubtitle1: While you're able to access the Quiz Library, you need to provide a OpenAI API key in order to auto generate a quiz.
welcomeToQuizBuddySubtitle2: This API key will only be used during quiz generation. The backend server discards it immediately after each generation. It is safely stored in your browser.
welcomeToQuizBuddySubtitle3: You can get a an API key from
welcomeToQuizBuddySubtitle7: to verify the behavior of the app or run it if you prefer to spin it up yourself.
needApiKeyToGenerateQuiz: Need an API key to generate a quiz
missingGptApiKeySubtitle: Cannot generate quiz without a OpenAI API key. Please set an API key
serverErrorSubtitle: There was an error with the server. Please try again later
shareYourQuizSubtitle: Share this quiz in the Quiz Library so others can use and participate in it?
incorrectApiKeySubtitle: The OpenAI GPT API key you provided is incorrect. Please provide a valid API key
filesRequired: Must provide files or text for quiz generation
howWouldYouLikeToProvideQuizMaterial: How would you like to provide quiz material?
